quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.quoteText: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw
quotes.quoteText: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quotes.quoteText: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'

quotes.author: William J. Clinton
quotes.quoteText: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama
quotes.quoteText: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.author: Doug Larson
quotes.quoteText: Instead of giving a politician the keys to the city, it might be better to change the locks.

quotes.author: John F. Kennedy
quotes.quoteText: Let us not seek the Republican answer or the Democratic answer, but the right answer. Let us not seek to fix the blame for the past. Let us accept our own responsibility for the future.

quotes.author: Dante Alighieri
quotes.quoteText: The darkest places in hell are reserved for those who maintain their neutrality in times of moral crisis.

quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quotes.quoteText: I love power. But it is as an artist that I love it. I love it as a musician loves his violin, to draw out its sounds and chords and harmonies.

quotes.author: Will Rogers
quotes.quoteText: I don't make jokes. I just watch the government and report the facts.

quotes.author: Ann Landers
quotes.quoteText: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyalty through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.

quotes.author: Erich Fromm
quotes.quoteText: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'

quotes.author: Mother Teresa
quotes.quoteText: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.quoteText: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.quoteText: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.

quotes.author: Ophelia in Hamlet
quotes.quoteText: We know what we are but not what we may be.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quoteText: I have not failed. I have just found 10,000 things that do not work.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quoteText: Great spirits have often overcome violent opposition from mediocre minds.

quotes.author: Roz Savage
quotes.quoteText: Ocean rowing is very much what you make it. Rowing technique is pretty irrelevant on the ocean. It's the psychology that's important.

quotes.author: Dane Cook
quotes.quoteText: I am an observer, I like to watch people. I am into psychology and people - how they act and such.

quotes.author: Sigmund Freud
quotes.quoteText: We are so made, that we can only derive intense enjoyment from a contrast and only very little from a state of things.
